remarks: The size of the set of (different!) words resulting by cyclically shifting a nonempty "repeated symbol word" is 1.  (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Nov-2018.)
statement:
cshwrepswhash1.m $e |- M = { w e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W cyclShift n ) = w } $.
cshwrepswhash1 $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ N e. NN /\ W = ( A repeatS N ) ) -> ( # ` M ) = 1 ) $.
$d A n w $.
$d N n w $.
$d V n w $.
$d W n w $.
